abstract: Illinois judge releases Jack McCullough and vacates his 2012 conviction in 1957 abduction and murder of 7-year-old Maria Ridulph; prosecutor discovered evidence supporting McCullough's alibi.

headline.print_headline: Man Convicted of 1957 Killing of Girl Freed on New Evidence
headline.main: Judge Vacates Conviction of Man Accused of 1957 Killing of Illinois Girl

snippet: A 76-year-old man who a prosecutor says was wrongly convicted in the 1957 killing was released from prison on Friday.
lead_paragraph: A 76-year-old man who a prosecutor says was wrongly convicted in the 1957 killing was released from prison on Friday.
